text: ZPM may refer to: * Mixtepec Zapotec (ISO 639-3 code: zpm), an Oto-Manguean language of Oaxaca, Mexico * Zero-propellant maneuver, an optimal attitude trajectory used to perform spacecraft rotational control without the need to use thrusters * Zyvex Technologies (previously Zyvex Performance Materials), a molecular engineering company headquartered in Columbus, Ohio
title: ZPM
